name: nonpregnant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A nonpregnant person or animal does not have a baby or babies developing inside their womb: The effect of the disease is the same as for a nonpregnant woman. The standard dose for non-pregnant women is 300 milligrams per day. Related word
pregnant
More examplesFewer examplesPregnant women are more likely to become infected than healthy non-pregnant adults.The likelihood of becoming ill is about the same for pregnant and nonpregnant women.We recruited 100 healthy male and non-pregnant female volunteers aged between 18 and 30.
